subject: Shipping to Argentina
description_text:
Hi, I see that you have the option to ship to Argentina, but I'd like to
ask, what method or shipping company do you use, I know I will have to pay
taxes. Also if you have already sent an order here, if you can tell me how
it went, or give me any help at all it would be appreciated.

conversations.body_text: Hi Franco Giova,    We use DHL in partnership with FedEx for shipping. Customers often request low-value declarations, but we are unaware of the actual duties they ultimately pay. However, we have not encountered any delivery issues to date.
